entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
